feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Digest, Onboarding fix, Telegram Fix, Bluesky fix, Docs, etc..
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update .env.example by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/575
  • Support for "Announcement" channels in Discord by @whallin in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/585
  • feat: #544-Add short.io as a shortening link by @ak7550 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/564
  • Updated Telegram Provider by @TonyAntoun in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/588
  • Added max length validation in user registration, company name and password which solve unhandled error in backend by @ArafatHossain403 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/495
  • feat(tiktok): add content posting method alternatives (direct post vs upload) by @keiwanmosaddegh in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/573
  • Digest Notifications by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/590

New Contributors

  • @egelhaus made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/575
  • @whallin made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/585
  • @ak7550 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/564
  • @TonyAntoun made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/588
  • @ArafatHossain403 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/495
  • @keiwanmosaddegh made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/573

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.31.1...v1.32.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Webhook feature!
New release for Postiz: Fixed instagram analytics
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Instagram analytics fix by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/594

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.33.1...v1.33.2

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Repeated posts, Wallet login, Tag posts
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Wallet login by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/599
  • Option to tag posts by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/602
  • Add a repeated post by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/603

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.33.2...v1.34.1
